summary: Comprehensive testing of WineStudy MVP completed. Backend APIs are 96.3% functional with only minor status code issue. Frontend is fully functional with excellent UX including landing page, atlas, grapes, study tracks, authentication, quiz, and tasting features. Language and theme toggles working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for POST requests
minor_bugs.impact: Cosmetic - functionality works correctly, data is created

design_issues.issue: Some navigation links ('Castas', 'Degustação') not consistently accessible via text selector

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and CTA buttons
Atlas page shows countries from Old/New World with filters working
Grapes page displays varieties with type and aromatic filters
Study page shows study tracks (basic, intermediate, advanced)
User registration with email/password works correctly
User login with email/password works correctly
Dashboard loads after login with user progress
Quiz page loads questions and accepts answers
Tasting form page loads with complete WSET SAT fields
Language toggle switches between PT and EN
Theme toggle switches between light and dark mode
All backend APIs return correct data (countries, grapes, study tracks)
Database seeding successful with wine data
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix: Update tasting creation endpoint to return 201 status code instead of 200. Improve navigation link accessibility for better test reliability.
